string.value: What does it mean to be a Thief, like #p1052001# in Kerning City? Talk to #p1002101# in Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# in Lith Harbor says you can choose to become a #bThief#k if you're at least #bLevel 10#k. He tells you to see #r#p1052001##k in #rKerning City#k. If you'd like to walk there, check your World Map. (#rW#k)
You learned what it takes to be a true Thief from #p1052001# in Henesys. You have a feeling this is the right path for you.
Ah, a #bThief#k requires a significant amount of dexterity (DEX) and luck (LUK). They're quick and sly. Are you thinking of becoming a Thief?
You need to head to Kerning City to meet #r#p1052001##k. Remember, to become a #rThief#k, you have to be at least #bLevel 10#k.
Passing by me and go further, you can find #bThief Statue#k to teleport to #bKerning City#k.
It'd be quite an experience just to find #b#p1052001##k... In any case, talk to me when you're ready to choose a path.
Did you travel all the way to this dingy hideout to become a Thief?
I see. Intriguing. If you're serious about this path, let's talk. But first, you have to be at least Level #r10#k. Until then, you have no business speaking with me.
#b#p1052001##k? He's in the basement of some cafe in Kerning City. He loves the dark.
